formatted_address: Block A, A0101, A0102, A0103, Eco Galleria, 3, Persiaran Eko Botani, Taman Eko Botani, 79100 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Á∫¢È¶Ü Red Coliseum @Eco Galleria

reviews.text:
I had the pleasure of dining at a delightful restaurant with family. The food was simply outstanding, each dish bursting with flavour and beautifully presented. Every bite was a testament to the chef's skill and dedication.

The staff were incredibly friendly, making us feel right at home from the moment we walked in. The cozy ambiance, paired with the exceptional service, created a perfect setting for an enjoyable and memorable dining experience.
Overall food were great , just a small critique to have it serve hot rather than warm will made the experience better .
It‚Äôs the first day of Red Coliseum serving lunch. My kids enjoy the food very much. Cozy environment and friendly staff, will be back again.

My 2nd time at Red Coliseum the ambiance was perfect. The food was absolutely scrumptious, especially the Burger pizza, pasta, and nachos; the red wine champagne cocktails were superb, and the service was admirable, except for one staff member. This gentleman was kind of rude and nonchalant. There was a customer who wanted to apologize bcuz they backed out last minute, so this customer approached this gentleman politely; however, he just walked away and ignored him. Please take care of how your employees interact with the customers. The live band is superb.üëç Notwithstanding the early experience we had. The singer singing yesterday, I assume she was doing rehearsal; has a beautiful voice; however, she was deafening‚Äîit's a pain for the ears to listen to her yesterday.
Great food, good live bands but very quiet and empty later. No one dancing

vicinity: Block A, A0101, A0102, A0103, Eco Galleria, 3, Persiaran Eko Botani, Taman Eko Botani, Iskandar Puteri
